text: 2019, After the Fall of New York () is a 1983 Italian French science fiction movie directed by Sergio Martino and starring Kurt Russell, Anna Kanakis, George Eastman, Romano Puppo. == Other websites == * * Category:1983 science fiction movies Category:Italian science fiction movies Category:French science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by Sergio Martino
title: 2019, After the Fall of New York
